syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
    "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open",
    "editor.mouseWheelZoom": true,
    "editor.fontSize": 18,
    "markdown.preview.fontSize": 16,
    "workbench.startupEditor": "none",
    "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
    "notebook.markup.fontSize": 30,
    "editor.mouseWheelScrollSensitivity": 4,
    "workbench.list.mouseWheelScrollSensitivity": 4,
    "terminal.integrated.mouseWheelScrollSensitivity": 4,
    "editor.codeLensFontSize": 18,
    "editor.inlayHints.fontSize": 18,
    "scm.inputFontSize": 18,
    "debug.console.fontSize": 18,
    "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 18,
    "jupyter.askForKernelRestart": false,
    "window.menuBarVisibility": "toggle",
    "githubPullRequests.pushBranch": "always",
    "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
    "git.autofetch": true,
    "git.ignoreRebaseWarning": true,
    "git.confirmSync": false,
    "glassit.alpha": 245,
    "notebook.output.textLineLimit": 1000,
    "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "'JetBrainsMono Nerd Font', 'monospace', monospace",
    "editor.fontFamily": "'JetBrainsMonoNL Nerd Font Thin', 'monospace', monospace",
    "editor.fontLigatures": false,
    "editor.wordWrap": "on",
    "explorer.confirmDragAndDrop": false,
    "notebook.lineNumbers": "on",
    "haskell.manageHLS": "GHCup",
    "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
    "editor.unicodeHighlight.invisibleCharacters": false,
    "editor.unicodeHighlight.ambiguousCharacters": false,
    "[python]": {
        "editor.formatOnType": true
    },
    "notebook.output.wordWrap": true,
    "workbench.editor.empty.hint": "hidden",
    "vsicons.dontShowNewVersionMessage": true,
    "workbench.colorTheme": "Dracula At Night",
    "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",
}"}
